if.test: senseDataDto.startTime != null and senseDataDto.startTime != '' and senseDataDto.endTime != null and senseDataDto.endTime != ''

where.if: AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), Collecttime, 120) >= #{senseDataDto.startTime} AND CONVERT (VARCHAR (20), Collecttime, 120) <= #{senseDataDto.endTime}

mapper.select: SELECT [FAI_26_35_Value] AS pin35 , [FAI_26_36_Value] AS pin36 , [FAI_26_29_Value] AS pin29 , [FAI_26_30_Value] AS pin30 , [FAI_26_31_Value] AS pin31 , [FAI_26_1_Value] AS pin1 , [FAI_26_2_Value] AS pin2 , [FAI_26_3_Value] AS pin3 , [FAI_26_4_Value] AS pin4 , [FAI_26_5_Value] AS pin5 , [FAI_26_6_Value] AS pin6 , [FAI_26_7_Value] AS pin7 , [FAI_26_8_Value] AS pin8 , [FAI_26_9_Value] AS pin9 , [FAI_26_10_Value] AS pin10 , [FAI_26_11_Value] AS pin11 , [FAI_26_12_Value] AS pin12 , [FAI_26_13_Value] AS pin13 , [FAI_26_14_Value] AS pin14 , [FAI_26_15_Value] AS pin15 , [FAI_26_16_Value] AS pin16 , [FAI_26_17_Value] AS pin17 , [FAI_26_18_Value] AS pin18 , [FAI_26_19_Value] AS pin19 , [FAI_26_20_Value] AS pin20 , [FAI_26_21_Value] AS pin21 , [FAI_26_22_Value] AS pin22 , [FAI_26_23_Value] AS pin23 , [FAI_26_24_Value] AS pin24 , [FAI_26_25_Value] AS pin25 , [FAI_26_26_Value] AS pin26 , [FAI_26_27_Value] AS pin27 , [FAI_26_28_Value] AS pin28 , [FAI_26_32_Value] AS pin32 , [FAI_26_33_Value] AS pin33 , [FAI_26_34_Value] AS pin34 FROM [MESDataCenter].[dbo].[m_D8X_Main_Line3_01_M8_t]

SELECT AVG(pin35) pin35 , AVG(pin36) pin36
, AVG(pin29) pin29 , AVG(pin30) pin30 , AVG(pin31) pin31
, AVG(pin1) pin1 , AVG(pin2) pin2 , AVG(pin3) pin3 , AVG(pin4) pin4 , AVG(pin5) pin5 , AVG(pin6) pin6 , AVG(pin7) pin7 , AVG(pin8) pin8 , AVG(pin9) pin9 , AVG(pin10) pin10 , AVG(pin11) pin11 , AVG(pin12) pin12 , AVG(pin13) pin13 , AVG(pin14) pin14
, AVG(pin15) pin15 , AVG(pin16) pin16 , AVG(pin17) pin17 , AVG(pin18) pin18 , AVG(pin19) pin19 , AVG(pin20) pin20 , AVG(pin21) pin21 , AVG(pin22) pin22 , AVG(pin23) pin23 , AVG(pin24) pin24 , AVG(pin25) pin25 , AVG(pin26) pin26 , AVG(pin27) pin27 , AVG(pin28) pin28
, AVG(pin32) pin32 , AVG(pin33) pin33 , AVG(pin34) pin34 FROM ( SELECT CAST([FAI_26_35_Value] AS float) pin35 , CAST([FAI_26_36_Value] AS float) pin36
, CAST([FAI_26_29_Value] AS float) pin29 , CAST([FAI_26_30_Value] AS float) pin30 , CAST([FAI_26_31_Value] AS float) pin31
, CAST([FAI_26_1_Value] AS float) pin1 , CAST([FAI_26_2_Value] AS float) pin2 , CAST([FAI_26_3_Value] AS float) pin3 , CAST([FAI_26_4_Value] AS float) pin4 , CAST([FAI_26_5_Value] AS float) pin5 , CAST([FAI_26_6_Value] AS float) pin6 , CAST([FAI_26_7_Value] AS float) pin7 , CAST([FAI_26_8_Value] AS float) pin8 , CAST([FAI_26_9_Value] AS float) pin9 , CAST([FAI_26_10_Value] AS float) pin10 , CAST([FAI_26_11_Value] AS float) pin11 , CAST([FAI_26_12_Value] AS float) pin12 , CAST([FAI_26_13_Value] AS float) pin13 , CAST([FAI_26_14_Value] AS float) pin14
, CAST([FAI_26_15_Value] AS float) pin15 , CAST([FAI_26_16_Value] AS float) pin16 , CAST([FAI_26_17_Value] AS float) pin17 , CAST([FAI_26_18_Value] AS float) pin18 , CAST([FAI_26_19_Value] AS float) pin19 , CAST([FAI_26_20_Value] AS float) pin20 , CAST([FAI_26_21_Value] AS float) pin21 , CAST([FAI_26_22_Value] AS float) pin22 , CAST([FAI_26_23_Value] AS float) pin23 , CAST([FAI_26_24_Value] AS float) pin24 , CAST([FAI_26_25_Value] AS float) pin25 , CAST([FAI_26_26_Value] AS float) pin26 , CAST([FAI_26_27_Value] AS float) pin27 , CAST([FAI_26_28_Value] AS float) pin28
, CAST([FAI_26_32_Value] AS float) pin32 , CAST([FAI_26_33_Value] AS float) pin33 , CAST([FAI_26_34_Value] AS float) pin34 FROM [MESDataCenter].[dbo].[m_D8X_Main_Line3_01_M8_t] WHERE LineID = #{senseDataDto.LineID} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), Collecttime, 120) >= #{senseDataDto.startTime} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), Collecttime, 120) <= #{senseDataDto.endTime} AND Barcode != '' AND FAI_12_Value != '999' ) A

SELECT AVG(pin1) 'FAI9_1' , AVG(pin2) 'FAI9_2' , AVG(pin3) 'FAI9_3' , AVG(pin4) 'FAI9_4' , AVG(pin5) 'FAI9_5' , AVG(pin6) 'FAI9_6' , AVG(pin7) 'FAI9_7' , AVG(pin8) 'FAI9_8' , AVG(pin1_28) FAI12 FROM ( SELECT CAST([FAI9-1_Value] AS float) pin1 , CAST([FAI9-2_Value] AS float) pin2
, CAST([FAI9-3_Value] AS float) pin3 , CAST([FAI9-4_Value] AS float) pin4 , CAST([FAI9-5_Value] AS float) pin5
